Tune in on August 5.

AsiaSpa

Jul 31, 2020

Bringing together some of the most influential minds in the world‚Äôs successful fitness, sports, wellness and hospitality businesses, the event will provide 10+ hours of immersive content, including one-on-one webcam networking, virtual exhibitions, live panels, interactive sessions, interviews and Q&A.
